posts.message: Guys we need to make something more useful than sharing links, what about recording a podcast, or having google hangouts and discuss something together? Thoughts?

posts.message: عَنْ عَائِشَةَ رَضِيَ الله عَنْهَا قَالَتْ: قُلْتُ: "يَا رَسُولَ اللَّهِ، أَرَأَيْتَ إِنْ عَلِمْتُ أَيُّ لَيْلَةٍ لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ مَا أَقُولُ فِيهَا؟"، قَالَ: "قُولِي: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ كَرِيمٌ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي".

Hey Guys,

My Name is Mohamed Alaa and I'm a Front End Developer. I work full time in Freshout.us an American Company based in Guadalajara, Mexico.

I'm currently Available for Freelance/Part-Time work. I have experience working on .NET, PHP, ROR, Java environments. I have very good experience in Semantic HTML, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3. Passionate for User Experience and Usability. I'm multilingual spoken (Arabic, English, Spanish, French).

My E-Mail is: malaa@seniorwebdesigner.com tonight I will update my portfolio to include my latest work.

Best Regards,
Mohamed Alaa
